Name: Currant (PH)
Description: A sweet cluster of berries that are cultivated for both their sweetness and their ornamental value.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: A sweet cluster of berries that are cultivated for both their sweetness and their ornamental value.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine süße Traube von Johannisbeeren, die wegen ihrer Süße und wegen ihres dekorativen Werts angebaut wird.

DescriptionLocalization.ru: Сладкие ягоды, выращиваемые как из-за их сладости, так и из-за их декоративной ценности.
